MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut CH62 postcode area of Wirral affecting properties Allport Road, Greenfield Crescent and the surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:35PM. Our engineers are on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we expect the power to be restored by 8:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:05PM on 19th April 2021
